messages.subject: Manga Download Here....
messages.msgSnippet: Shimizu Hitomi has a friends only post here: http://community.livejournal.com/edo_meiji/65788.html so if you want a realistically drawn manga about Okita s
messages.messageBody:
Shimizu Hitomi has a friends only post here:

http://community.livejournal.com/edo_meiji/65788.html

so if you want a realistically drawn manga about Okita's last days
please join http://www.livejournal.com/edo_meiji, friend the community
and you'll see her post

I downloaded the manga and indeed this is not a soft cuddly
manga...very intense!
